title: How can I use the one button screen lock function?
answer:
Go to Home > Tools and touch the Screen Lock icon and the screen will immediately lock. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140240)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140241)

 The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
